entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:33 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
